field.name: summary
field.value: Castle.Core does not work in a medium trust environment

field.name: description
field.value:
I use DynamicProxy in Castle.Core 2.5 as the Proxy Factory for NHibernate 3.0. My only problem with it is that it doesn't work in a medium trust environment.
After recompiling it with the AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute enabled, it works. I don't know if you have a policy about not enabling this by default, but if there isn't one, I would suggest you to put AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers into the CommonAssemblyInfo.cs. After doing this and recompiling, it works fine for me.
I think I'm not the only one who encountered this, so why not make life a little bit easier by adding this attribute to the assembly?
